name: Brick Breaker (itch) (Aksh Sandhu)
description:
Brick Breaker game is game that is developed  by playing  other games in market similar to this. This game is made without watching youtube tutorials. This game helped me to know many different Aspects of Unity And Especially C#,As this is my first game that i have created on my Own.

There will be future updates introducing more levels in game along with bugs fixes and other improvements.

Please feel free to give any suggestions  regarding bugs or further development of game.
